header.title: Hi, I am Tamas.
header.introtext: I am a self-taught web developer who is looking for his first full-time front-end position.

description.paragraph: My undergrad programme partially revolved around HTML, CSS and JS back in the late 2000s, and while I continued my grad programme with a social/political science angle and later worked as a teacher in several different institutions, my interest in coding in general never wavered.
In 2019, I refreshed my HTML, CSS and JS knowledge and continued with learning React and its ecosystem. I completed Udacity's FrontEnd NanoDegree programme in early 2020.
I have spent this last year building projects small and big to expand my knowledge in various directions.
Some of the techs I have been working with:

list.title: Star Wars Keys
list.subtitle: project-001
list.description: One of the many smaller vanilla HTML/CSS/JS projects I have built as practice.

list.title: News Index
list.subtitle: project-002a
list.description: A React front / Express back application that fetches and displays news items from a third-party API based on various country/category selection.

list.title: Central Kanto Pokemon Database
list.subtitle: project-003
list.description: A pokemon themed application that imitates a subscription-based service site with form submit pages and a search functionality serving a public API database.

list.title: Evrallas
list.subtitle: project-004
list.description: Evralles is a choose-your-own-adventure story game. The application includes multiple adventures to choose from, user statistics and achievement tracking, different colour themes and more.

list.title: Portfolio Site
list.subtitle: project-005
list.description: A simple static portfolio site to showcase some of my projects.
